name: FuelPrice Australia
author: Visser Labs

sections.description:
This is FuelPrice Australia’s official Plugin for WordPress.

This Plugin relies on the FuelPrice Australia API as a service to display localised Australian fuel prices within your WordPress site. Review the Privacy Policy for FuelPrice Australia.

Want regular updates? Become a fan on Facebook

For more information visit our site.

Usage

You can manage the FuelPrice Australia Widget from one of two places within the WordPress Administration.

Customizer

  1. From the Administration bar showing at the top of the screen click Customise
  2. Expand the Widgets menu from the left sidebar
  3. Click the Add a widget button from the bottom of the Widget Area list
  4. Select the FuelPrice Australia Widget from the list or search for it
  5. Expand the FuelPrice Australia Widget options and set the required fields; Widget type and City
  6. Click Publish from the top of the left sidebar

Widgets screen

  1. Open Appearance > Widgets from the WordPress Administration
  2. Drag the FuelPrice Australia widget from the Available Widgets section to your preferred Sidebar
  3. Expand the FuelPrice Australia widget options and set the required fields; Widget type and City
  4. Click Save
  5. Open up your WordPress site

Done!

Support

If you have any problems, questions or suggestions please create a topic here on the FuelPrice Australia dedicated forum.

FuelPrice Australia on w.org

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘fuelprice-australia’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate ‘FuelPrice Australia’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

See Usage section before for instructions on how to add Widgets to your site.
sections.faq:
What is FuelPrice Australia?

FuelPrice Australia monitors retail fuel prices from public sources across Australia to inform Australian motorists as fuel prices approach the low of their local pricing cycles.

Do I need a FuelPrice Australia Account?

No. The embeddable Widget does not require an account. You can create one for free: it’s easy and it only takes a few minutes.

  • Changed: Plugin logo
  • Fixed: Missing Widget description

1.0

  • Added: First working release of the Plugin

short_description: Embed Widgets from the FuelPrice Australia website within your WordPress site.
